de.iss.mv2.messaging

Class MessageField

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.messaging.MV2CommunicationElement
      • de.iss.mv2.messaging.MessageField
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentEncodingField

    public class MessageField
extends MV2CommunicationElement
    Represents a content field of a MV2Message.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
